mapper.select: select , pwd, cdt, photo from lms_member order by member_id desc
select , cdt, photo from lms_member where member_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into lms_member (name, email, pwd, tel, photo) values (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{tel}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update lms_member set name = #{name}, email = #{email}, pwd = password(#{password}), cdt = now(), tel = #{tel}, photo = #{photo} where member_id = #{no}
